application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - INFORMATIVE: You are advised that this permission constitutes partial approval of Condition 65 (Detailed drawings & materials) only. The remaining parts are required to be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority in accordance with the requirements of Condition 65 of planning permission 2013/6639 dated 29th April 2014.
description: Submission of external design guides pursuant to part B7(i) of Condition 65 (detailed drawings/design) of planning permission 2013/6639 dated 29/04/2014 for "Application for Amendments to the outline planning permission dated 6th December 2013 (ref: 2013/2742) for the restoration, extension, alterations and conversion of the Power Station building to provide retail, residential flats, business, cultural, hotel and conference facilities, event space and incidental accommodation; the demolition of other buildings and development of the land surrounding the Power Station and adjacent/nearby sites to provide retail, restaurants bars and cafes, offices, hotel, residential, community and cultural space, assembly and leisure space, student housing, serviced apartments, an energy centre and basement plant; parking for cars, coaches, motorcycles and bicycles; new access and internal road system and servicing; 'off-site' highway works; works to the jetty to facilitate river transport and fuel delivery, including alterations to the river wall; provision of open space and landscaping works. (The application relates primarily to the Power Station building, and the amendments include changes to the land uses including an increase in the retail floorspace; an increase in the number of residential units; external alterations to the Power Station building; internal alterations to the layout; and a revised Energy Strategy)."
